ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] bards in guilds...
ygData.msgSnippet: talanic told me to do a /w 33 60 bard all the other night and there were 16 i think.  in my guild there are 4 primary bards over 30: two 60 bards, me (57),
ygData.messageBody:
talanic told me to do a "/w 33 60 bard all" the other night and there were
16 i think. in my guild there are 4 primary bards over 30: two 60 bards, me
(57), and a 56. mith marr is so tweaked on bard drops that we are all in
full SS, all have BoH, etc. i think we have 1 twink bard around level 45.

Shada

> Just one . . . me, almost 31. Besides that there is a level
> 28, 12 and a 7.
> I did a /who all bard 30 40, /who all bard 41 50, /who all
> bard 51 60, the
> other day when there were 2400 people on the server and only
> came up with a
> total of about 30 people across all 3 searches. =\ More
> armor for me I guess!
>
> -Steve
